thread.title: Martin Shkreli Sentenced to Seven Years in Prison

author: Rebecca Davis O’Brien
title: Martin Shkreli Sentenced to Seven Years in Prison
text:
A federal judge in Brooklyn sentenced Martin Shkreli to seven years in prison on Friday, following the former pharmaceutical executive’s conviction last summer on securities-fraud charges.
Federal prosecutors had sought a prison term of at least 15 years for Mr. Shkreli, while his lawyers had asked U.S. District Judge Kiyo A. Matsumoto to impose a sentence of 12 to 18 months in prison. Mr. Shkreli will receive credit for the six months he has served in detention since September.
...
